sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CheckServiceClass</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CheckServiceClass</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CheckServiceClass = Class.create();
CheckServiceClass.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'CheckServiceClass',
    ajaxFunction_checkServiceClass: function() {
        var counter = 0;
        var selectedId = this.getParameter('sysparm_selected_id');
        var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_label');
        var serviceClassName = this.getParameter('sysparm_service_class_name');
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        gr.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", selectedId);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            var grServiceClassName = gr.getValue("service_classification");
            if ((grServiceClassName != null) && (grServiceClassName != serviceClassName)) {
                counter++;
            }
        }
        return counter ? counter : true;
    },
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-30 06:50:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8a8da6a9eb220110b02cb9e12a5228ab</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CheckServiceClass</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Portfolio Management Foundation" source="com.snc.service_portfolio">5692894b6d6620100acb70b3534330f5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8a8da6a9eb220110b02cb9e12a5228ab</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-30 07:51:22</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>853</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
